name: Akshat Garg
title: Software Engineer | Full Stack Developer
about: Hey there! I'm a passionate software engineer from India, specializing in UI development and full stack web applications. With expertise in JavaScript frameworks like ReactJS, NextJS, and Qwik, I create high-performance, user-friendly software solutions for businesses and open source. I'm Computer Science graduate (2023) from Birla Institute of Technology Mesra, Ranchi. In addition to writing code for companies, I enjoy contributing to open-source projects and exploring the world of blogging. Outside of work, I love traveling, trekking, and capturing scenic photographs.
